triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Core machine learning method used for solving optimal control policies in the secure containment problem.

triples.name: Game theory
triples.relevance: Framework used to model the attack-defense process between secure controllers and malicious attackers.

triples.name: Zero-sum game
triples.relevance: Game-theoretic framework where controller gains offset attacker losses in the containment control problem.

triples.name: Neural network
triples.relevance: Critic-only neural network structure used to approximate value functions in the reinforcement learning approach.

triples.name: Bellman equation
triples.relevance: Mathematical framework for solving optimal control problems, specifically used for attitude loop control design.

triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: Application domain for the secure containment control scheme developed in the paper.

triples.name: Quadcopter
triples.relevance: Specific platform used for experimental validation of the proposed secure containment control scheme.

triples.name: Optimal control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel secure containment control method combining optimal control theory with game-theoretic reinforcement learning.

triples.name: Cyber-physical systems security
triples.relevance: The paper addresses secure control in cyber-physical systems by developing defense mechanisms against control command manipulation attacks.
